message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable for you. I'm asking for $12,000, which reflects its true worth.
I'm really interested in the product, but $12,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe that's a fair price considering the product's value to me.
I understand your position, Bob, but $9,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept.  How about we meet in the middle at $11,000?
I'm still a bit above my budget at $11,000. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but I'm not sure I can stretch any further. Can you meet me at this price?
